title: Fort Smith National Historic Site: Learn About the Park
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park           Learn About the Park       News Find press releases and stay connected through social media.  Photos and Multimedia Browse our photo galleries, watch a movie about the park, or check out our webcam!  History &Culture Discovery the cultures, people, and stories that shaped Fort Smith  Nature Find out what types of plants and animals call the park home.  Education Use the historic site as your classroom! Check out this section for teacher resources and education materials. Kids &Youth Researching a school project? Want to become a Junior Ranger? Come discover all the cool things for kids at the park! Management Curious about how your national park is managed? Look here for information on our laws, policies and regulations which guide our park management team. Bookstore As a non-profit cooperating association, Eastern National produces interpretive publications and other products and manages bookstores in National Park Service visitor centers. Proceeds from these sales support education and interpretive activities in the parks.
